Description: Al Yamamah Steel Industries (known as: Al Yamamah Steel) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since May2016. Al Yamamah Steel operates within the Materials sector focusing on Steel. It has one Subsidiary operating across Saudi Arabia. Al Yamamah Steel is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in January 1989.
